title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6059.3 - Composition of the Appeals Board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6059.3 - Composition of the Appeals Board

State Regulations

The appeals board shall consist of the following
members: (a) The commissioner of the

Division of Criminal Justice Services or their designee. (b) The superintendent of the Division of

State Police or their designee. (c) The firearm license appeals officer designated by the non-judicial licensing
officers within the State, who shall serve on the appeals board for appeals
that originate from the political subdivision from which they were
appointed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

6059.3

Adopted

New

York State Register October 23, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 43, eff. 10/23/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
